sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import ProductRating from '../ProductRating/ProductRating' import * as S from './productItem.style' export default function ProductItem({ product }) { const { _id, images, price, rating, price_before_discount, quantity, sold, view, name, category, image, createdAt, updatedAt } = product return ( {name} đ{price_before_discount} đ{price} {sold} Đã bán Hà Nội ) }
